short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A reminder to get you un-stuck

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You visit distracting sites every day, sites that suck time away - blink and an hour is gone. Catch yourself and get that time back before your whole day is gone. A quick reminder and closing the tab is usually enough to get you back on track. 
Easily add the sites that distract you and get that reminder when you visit them. Customize how soon the reminder pops up - it's ok to take a mental breather after all! Turn the extension on and off, manage your list of distracting sites, and choose how long you want to relax. A simple and functional extension to give you your time back.

Privacy policy : This extension does not send or sell your browsing information. It does store the list of sites that you generate to your Google account.
